name: Bulat Sabirov

aboutMeParagraphs: I'm a third-year student at ITIS, Kazan Federal University. I have the ability to quickly learn necessary skills and adapt to new technologies. I approach work with a sense of responsibility, striving to meet deadlines and valuing the quality of the product, I always try to help my colleagues and I’m not shy about asking for help.
I'm open to new challenges and committed to active collaboration.

career.description: Developed backend and frontend of KFU kindergarten website on Django & React
Developed digitized version of the Kazan botanical garden's plants database on Django & Vue
